title: Extracting HOG Features
description: In Data Science the HOG (Histogram of Gradients) is a straightforward feature extraction process that was developed with the idea of identifying pedestrians within images. A fast HOG extractor is built into the Scikit-Image project, and we can try it out relatively quickly and visualize the oriented gradients within each cell:
